alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:01PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lincoln, southern Logan, southeastern McPherson and west central Custer Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stapleton to 9 miles north of North Platte Airport to near Hershey. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Hershey, Arnold, Maxwell, Gandy, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Logan, Tarboz Lake, Hoagland and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 217 and 248. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 162 and 188. Highway 83 between mile markers 71 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
